credit_line: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
title: Pig
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
description: In the shape of a pig in profile, legs tucked beneath, with curly tail and floppy ears. Link attached on pig's back behind lid hinge. Head and front legs form lid. Striker recessed in bottom.
name: Matchsafe
